summary: I JUST BOUGHT THIS VEHICLE, AND A WEEK LATER THE ANTI-LOCK RELAY SWITCH STUCK IN THE ON POSITION. RUNNING THE BATTERY DOWN, AND DISABLING THE ANTI-LOCK BRAKE SYSTEM. NOW I HAVE TO PAY 700.00 FOR THIS LITTLE PART OR I HAVE NO ACTIVE WORKING BRAKES. DEALERS WILL NOT FIX THIS BECAUSE IT'S NOT PART OF THE DRIVE TRAIN.........HELP!           *JB
